Comments_List: I learned a great deal about the EV industry, the regulatory process in the utilities industry, and public policy engagement more generally.
Very well, learnt much more than I though I would!
Very well - this course exceeded my expectations and was a tremendous opportunity to work with a leading organization in AEE.
A little bit more structure and clearer expectations would have been helpful.

We took a while in the beginning to sort out the projects, but other than that no complaints.

The strengths of the course are the diversity of project options, the access to AEE/other leading organizations, and the ability to work with Dan Utech, who is a leading public policy thinker in this space.
Be prepared to work with ambiguous challenges and mentally tiring work yet ultimately very rewarding!!
Make sure you screen the projects beforehand, know if one fits your interests.
